amendment.description: To provide emergency funding to upgrade the Fox Point hurricane barrier in Providence, Rhode Island.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3592 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3592 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S4009-4010; text: CR S4009) To provide emergency funding to upgrade the Fox Point hurricane barrier in Providence, Rhode Island.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3592 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Reed.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3592 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
